resources.string: DJs spin a variety of tunes, from funk to garage rock, in this unassuming hangout with a patio.
A 2-story venue & beer garden that serves up wood-fired pizzas plus handcrafted beers & ales.
Relaxed, unpretentious bar for local brews, nightly karaoke, live music & open-mike events.
Guests enjoy housemade brews & small American bites amid an industrial-chic setting.
Bustling watering hole with a neon marquee draws a diverse crowd for drink discounts & free popcorn.
An extensive list of draft beer & pub grub served in a funky spot with rustic wood tables & patio.
Lively sports bar with several TVs & a large projection screen, plus burgers, BBQ food & sandwiches.
Dimly lit lounge & happy-hour fave serves rotating craft beers, specialty cocktails & light bites.
